subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the significance of the Amber Fort in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में अमेर क्या महत्व है ?
B_en: It is the home of the royal family.
C_en: It is a symbol of Rajput culture.
D_en: It is a popular tourist attraction.
explanation_en: The Amber Fort in Jaipur symbolizes the rich Rajput culture of Rajasthan. It showcases the architectural and cultural heritage of the region.
explanation_hi: जयपुर में अमेर फोट राजपुरी संकेत
explanation: राजस्थान की राजपुरी संकेतशास्तान की राजपुरी संकेत
question_en: What does the Amber Fort in Jaipur represent?
question_hi: Jaipur में अमेर फोट राजपुर शास्तान की संकेत

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the traditional art form of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन संतुल की संकेत
options: Rajasthani Yeh Bihar Ki Rajasthani Culture Mein Kya Hai?
Q1 राजस्थान में कौन संतुल की संकेत
options.explanation_en: The traditional art form prevalent in Rajasthan is the Kalbelia Dance, which is a colorful and vibrant dance performed by Kalbelia tribespeople.
options.explanation_hi: राजस्थान में कौन संतुल की संकेत

options.subject: Rajasthan History
options.question_en: Which festival is celebrated in Rajasthan with great enthusiasm?
options.question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन स्नोती है राजस्थान की खर्चरींग की संकेत
options.explanation_en: The Kite Festival is a significant festival celebrated in Rajasthan with great enthusiasm. It involves flying kites and is an important part of the state's culture.

options.subject: Rajasthan History
options.question_en: Which folk dance is famous in Rajasthan?
options.explanation_en: Ghoomar is a popular folk dance style originating from Rajasthan, showcasing the vibrant culture of the state.
options.explanation_hi: Ghoomar राजस्थान में की फोलक डायन

options.subject: Rajasthan History
options.question_en: What is the famous Rajasthani food item?
options.explanation_en: Gatta ki Jalebi is a famous sweet delicacy of Rajasthan. It is a popular dessert made from deep-fried dough balls soaked in sugar syrup.

options.question_en: Which classical music genre is associated with Rajasthan?
